name: Run For Baby
description:
What is the aim of the game?

            You have to collect the products with on your list and take them to the cashier before the time expires. When you complete the list, your time will increase a little and you will be given a new list to collect the items. If you click on anything other than the items you need to buy, you will lose time!

Controls:

Movement = "W,A,S,D" or "Direction Keys"
Run = "Left Shift"
Jump = "Space"
Squat = "Left CTRL"
Collect items = "Left Click of Mouse"
Interaction with the cash register= "Left Click of Mouse"
Show List= "Tab"

Credit:

Game Design: Hilal Uysal  
3D Design: Batuhan Başar Özdamar 
Developer: Faruk İlhan 
Sound Design: Hilal Uysal 
UI Design: Hilal Uysal 
Female Voice Actor: Hilal Uysal  
Level Design: Hilal Uysal & Batuhan Başar Özdamar
